page.title: 13HOUSING IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {HOUSING IN WOODHALL SPA Housing of all types exist,large,older properties with plenty of ground,once built to accomodate patients for treatment in the Spa's heyday are now being turned into rest homes,giving the Spa a very high geriatric ratio.Modern buildings favour detached 2 and 3 bedroomed bungalows & houses, but executive homes usually having 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.Some exising terrace houses still have no inside toilets.Recently there has been a storm against allowing further development,and the people in Witham Road in particular have voiced their options in an organised manner.Less organised are the prodevelopment people who want to see expansion in order to keep up trade figures and facilities.The village is roughly divided in this.
